techmeme.title: Flipkart plans to shift its holding company from Singapore to India as Walmart aims to take it public; Flipkart moved the entity to Singapore in 2011 (Kashish Tandon/Reuters)

Bluesky starts rolling out blue check verification, initially limiting verification to select organizations and its moderation team (Kate Knibbs/Wired)
A Columbia student suspended over a tool to cheat on job interviews says he's raised a $5.3M seed for Cluely, which offers an AI tool to "cheat on everything" (Charles Rollet/TechCrunch)
